content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While discussing as Peter Schmidt, let's focus on the price negotiation for the apartment. Haoyu, I believe this prime location and modern apartment would be ideal for you. To start, I had initially thought of 1250 Euros as a reasonable rent, but I am open to hearing your proposed amount.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. Given my situation as a responsible and smart student, I understand the value of this apartment but need to be mindful of my budget. I would like to propose a rental price closer to 1100 Euros to ensure affordability while still appreciating the apartment's features and location. I agree to negotiate further on this figure.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Though I was aiming for a higher price, I must say your proposal is reasonable considering your circumstances. Haoyu, if we agree on 1150 Euros as the rental price, I think we have found a fair compromise. 'I agree to the price of 1150 Euro!' (To end the negotiation when an agreement is met, write 'TERMINATE') However, if this figure does not work for you, please let me know and we can continue discussing a different amount. Otherwise, TERMINATE.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
